creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: two men standing closely gazing to L; man in rear has darker complexion; wears brown robes with green shoes; hands appear to be held up behind neck; man at front has paler complexion; wears white and gray robe with blue shoes; standing in profile; both men have wispy facial hair and large, narrow eyes; scattered foliage near their feet
title: Zen Eccentrics Kanzan and Jittoku
